summary: An Ordinance granting to C. P. Dose, et al, authority and permission to improve, by grading and curbing, and by the construction of Concrete Sidewalks, Walker Street, from Thirty-first Avenue to the East Line of C. P. Dose's Lake Washington Addition to the City of Seattle, and Thirty-second Avenue and Thirty-third Avenue, each from the north line of said Addition to the south line of said addition, all in the City of Seattle, at their own proper cost and expense.
